xhochy commented on pull request #4024: ARROW-4646: [C++/Packaging] Ship gandiva with the conda-forge packages
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4024#discussion_r269199744
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/cmake_modules/FindGandiva.cmake
 ##########
 @@ -43,7 +43,7 @@ else()
 
   set(GANDIVA_SEARCH_HEADER_PATHS ${GANDIVA_HOME}/include)
 
-  set(GANDIVA_SEARCH_LIB_PATH "${GANDIVA_HOME}")
+  set(GANDIVA_SEARCH_LIB_PATH "${GANDIVA_HOME}/lib")
 
 Review comment:
   We should not hardcode `lib` here as on some systems like Debian this could be in a different location that would be picked up by the default `PATH_SUFFIXES`

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description:
Gandiva is not yet built with the conda packages:
https://github.com/conda-forge/arrow-cpp-feedstock/blob/master/recipe/build.sh
fields.summary: [C++/Packaging] Ship gandiva with the conda-forge packages
